[30;1m58 | [0m[35m    It is implied that the main process which launched the others has ``LOCAL_RANK=0``.[0m
[30;1m59 | [0m[35m    Beside the local rank, the following other environment variables also get set, but unlike the lo[0m
[30;1m60 | [0m[35m    get determined by the cluster environment:[0m
[30;1m61 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m62 | [0m[35m    1. `MASTER_ADDR`: The IP address of the main node.[0m

[30;1m294 | [0m[35m            Use the ``on_before_optimizer_step`` if you need the unscaled gradients.[0m
[30;1m295 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m296 | [0m[35m        """[0m

[30;1m330 | [0m[35m    def resumed_on_epoch_end(self) -> bool:[0m

[30;1m343 | [0m[35m        backbone_initial_ratio_lr:[0m
[30;1m344 | [0m[35m            Used to scale down the backbone learning rate compared to rest of model[0m

[30;1m46 | [0m[35m        prefix: A string to put at the beginning of metric keys.[0m
[30;1m47 | [0m[35m        flush_logs_every_n_steps: How often to flush logs to disk (defaults to every 100 steps).[0m
[30;1m48 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m49 | [0m[35m    Example::[0m

[30;1m113 | [0m[35m            To disable, set ``every_n_train_steps = 0``. This value must be ``None`` or non-negative[0m
[30;1m114 | [0m[35m            This must be mutually exclusive with ``train_time_interval`` and ``every_n_epochs``.[0m
[30;1m115 | [0m[35m        train_time_interval: Checkpoints are monitored at the specified time interval.[0m
[30;1m116 | [0m[35m            For all practical purposes, this cannot be smaller than the amount[0m
[30;1m117 | [0m[35m            of time it takes to process a single training batch. This is not[0m
[30;1m118 | [0m[35m            guaranteed to execute at the exact time specified, but should be close.[0m

[30;1m24 | [0m[35mclass LightningEnvironment(ClusterEnvironment):[0m
[30;1m25 | [0m[35m    """The default environment used by Lightning for a single node or free cluster (not managed).[0m

[30;1m28 | [0m[35m[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m406[0m[34m of [0m[33m1108[0m[31m ]--[0m

  Severity: [36mImportant[0m, Confidence: [36mLow[0m

   Pattern: [32m\.(request|post|get)\([0m
[30;1m82 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m83 | [0m[35m    @override[0m
[30;1m84 | [0m[35m    def node_rank(self) -> int:[0m

[30;1m219 | [0m[35m        precision_to_bits = {"64": 64, "32": 32, "16": 16, "bf16": 16}[0m

[30;1m222 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m223 | [0m[35m    @property[0m

[30;1m184 | [0m[35mampler for training, because during training the[0m
[30;1m185 | [0m[35m    DistributedDataParallel syncs buffers on each forward pass, so it could freeze if one of the pro[0m

[30;1m36 | [0m[35mclass _XLALauncher(_MultiProcessingLauncher):[0m

[30;1m48 | [0m[35m:[0m
[30;1m49 | [0m[35m    """Convert ZeRO 2 or 3 checkpoint into a single fp32 consolidated ``state_dict`` file that can b[0m
[30;1m50 | [0m[35m    ``torch.load(file)`` + ``load_state_dict()`` and used for training without DeepSpeed. It gets co[0m
[30;1m51 | [0m[35m    level checkpoint dir, so the user can easily do the conversion at any point in the future. Once [0m
[30;1m52 | [0m[35m    weights don't require DeepSpeed and can be used in any application. Additionally the script has [0m
[30;1m53 | [0m[35m    ensure we keep the lightning state inside the state dict for being able to run[0m
[30;1m54 | [0m[35m    ``LightningModule.load_from_checkpoint('...')```.[0m

[30;1m219 | [0m[35m        """Moves all the tuner specific callbacks at the beginning of the list and all the `ModelChe[0m

[30;1m88 | [0m[35m    Fully Sharded Training shards the entire model across all available GPUs, allowing you to scale [0m
[30;1m89 | [0m[35m    size, whilst using efficient communication to reduce overhead. In practice, this means we can re[0m
[30;1m90 | [0m[35m    at parity with PyTorch DDP, whilst scaling our model sizes dramatically. The technique is simila[0m
